get.summary: Get a list of accounts.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma Separated list of ids to be returned.

200.description: The accounts were found and returned

get.summary: Find accounts.
get.description: Required Permissions: ViewAccounts Developer Information: There is no developer information provided for this endpoint.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query string. If left blank, it will return all accounts.

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: Boolean true or false. Sorts accounts in a descending order if true.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: The page index number. The initial page is 0.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of results per page. The maximum number is 200.

200.description: The accounts were found and returned

get.summary: Find accounts from the system by searchable fields.
get.description: Required Permissions: ViewAccounts Developer Information: If you want to use an OR to check for multiple values of one field then the value provided should contain the values to be ORed separated by ||.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to search.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Comma separated list of values to search parallel to the fields provided.

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: Boolean true or false. Sorts accounts in a descending order if true.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: The page index number. The initial page is 0.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of results per page. The maximum number is 200.

200.description: The accounts were found and returned

get.x-developerInformation: If you want to use an OR to check for multiple values of one field then the value provided should contain the values to be ORed separated by ||.

post.summary: Authenticate user's credentials and return the authentication token if successful.
post.description: Required Permissions: The credentials that need to be validated in this endpoint is username/email address, password, and siteName. Developer Information: There is no developer information provided for this endpoint.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
The credentials must be authenticated in the application/x-www-form-urlencoded form:
client_id=[username or email address]
client_secret=[user password]
grant_type=client_credentials
siteName

200.description: Authentication was successful. Authentication token was returned.

401.description: Unable to authorize the user credentials

post.x-requiredPermissions: The credentials that need to be validated in this endpoint is username/email address, password, and siteName.

post.description:
Required Permissions: CreateTranslations Developer Information: This endpoint creates a translation specific to a site and language. The JSON object containing all the translations is stored as a string and therefore must have escaped quotes when the translation object is created. You can use a tool like http://bernhardhaeussner.de/odd/json-escape/ to test this method via Swagger. Example: {
"siteName": "core",
"language": "en",
"accountId": 1,
"name": "English Core Translation",
"text": "{
\"welcome\" : \"Hello there!\",
\"download_master\" : \"Download Master\"
}"
}

200.description: The translation was created successfully

500.description: Unable to create the translation

post.x-developerInformation: This endpoint creates a translation specific to a site and language. The JSON object containing all the translations is stored as a string and therefore must have escaped quotes when the translation object is created. You can use a tool like http://bernhardhaeussner.de/odd/json-escape/ to test this method via Swagger.

get.summary: Find user roles.

200.description: The user roles were found and returned

500.description: No user roles were found

get.summary: Find user roles from the system by searchable fields.
get.description: Required Permissions: ViewUserRoles Developer Information: If you want to use an OR to check for multiple values of one field then the value provided should contain the values to be ORed separated by ||.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma Separated list of fields to search

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Comma Separated list of values to search parallel to the fields provided

200.description: The user roles were found and returned

get.x-developerInformation: If you want to use an OR to check for multiple values of one field then the value provided should contain the values to be ORed separated by ||.

delete.summary: Delete a user's role from the system.

get.summary: Validate an authentication token.
get.description: Required Permissions: There are no required permissions for this endpoint. Developer Information: The credentials that need to be validated in this endpoint are the authentication token and the site name.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
The token information needs to be authentication in the application/x-www-form-urlencoded form:
authScheme=Bearer&authSchemeData=[your authentication token]&siteName=[your account identifier]

200.description: The token is valid.

get.x-developerInformation: The credentials that need to be validated in this endpoint are the authentication token and the site name.
